001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.PosterUseCase;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.IoMode;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.logging.LoggingConfigurator;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Paths;
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.nio.file.Files;
011import java.nio.file.Path;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Optional;
014import org.slf4j.Logger;
015import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
016
017/**
018 * Entry point for rendering reconstructed protocol traffic into poster outputs.
019 *
020 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
021 */
022public final class PosterCli {
023  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PosterCli.class);
024  private static final String SUMMARY_USAGE =
025      "usage: poster [httpIn=PATH|kafka:TOPIC] [tnIn=PATH|kafka:TOPIC] "
026          + "[httpOut=PATH] [tnOut=PATH] [ioMode=FILE|KAFKA] [posterOutMode=FILE|KAFKA] "
027          + "[kafkaBootstrap=HOST:PORT] [decode=none|transfer|all] [--dry-run] [--allow-overwrite]";
028  private static final String HELP_TEXT = """
029      RADAR poster pipeline
030
031      Usage:
032        poster [protocol options] [global options]
033
034      Inputs (at least one required):
035        httpIn=PATH|kafka:TOPIC   HTTP pair input directory or Kafka topic ([A-Za-z0-9._-])
036        tnIn=PATH|kafka:TOPIC     TN3270 pair input directory or Kafka topic
037
038      Outputs:
039        httpOut=PATH              HTTP report directory when posterOutMode=FILE
040        tnOut=PATH                TN3270 report directory when posterOutMode=FILE
041        posterOutMode=FILE|KAFKA  Default FILE writes under ~/.radar/out; KAFKA requires kafkaBootstrap
042
043      Global options:
044        ioMode=FILE|KAFKA         FILE reads directories; KAFKA requires kafkaBootstrap
045        kafkaBootstrap=HOST:PORT  Validated host/port for Kafka inputs/outputs
046        decode=none|transfer|all  Poster decoding behaviour (default none)
047        --dry-run                 Validate inputs and print plan without rendering
048        --allow-overwrite         Permit writing into non-empty output directories
049        --verbose                 Enable DEBUG logging
050        --help                    Show this message
051
052      Notes:
053        ? File inputs must exist and be readable. File outputs are created as needed unless --dry-run.
054        ? Directories are canonicalized; reuse requires --allow-overwrite.
055        ? Kafka topics are sanitized to [A-Za-z0-9._-].
056      """;
057
058  private PosterCli() {}
059
060  /**
061   * Entry point invoked by the JVM.
062   *
063   * @param args raw CLI arguments
064   */
065  public static void main(String[] args) {
066    ExitCode exit = run(args);
067    System.exit(exit.code());
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Executes the poster CLI and returns a normalized exit code.
072   *
073   * @param args raw CLI arguments
074   * @return exit code describing the outcome
075   */
076  static ExitCode run(String[] args) {
077    CliInput input = CliInput.parse(args);
078    if (input.help()) {
079      CliPrinter.println(HELP_TEXT.stripTrailing());
080      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
081    }
082    if (input.verbose()) {
083      LoggingConfigurator.enableVerboseLogging();
084      log.debug("Verbose logging enabled for poster CLI");
085    }
086
087    boolean dryRun = input.hasFlag("--dry-run");
088    boolean allowOverwrite = input.hasFlag("--allow-overwrite");
089
090    Map<String, String> kv;
091    try {
092      kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(input.keyValueArgs());
093    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
094      log.error("Invalid argument: {}", ex.getMessage());
095      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
096      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
097    }
098
099    PosterConfig config;
100    try {
101      config = PosterConfig.fromMap(kv);
102    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
103      log.error("Invalid poster configuration: {}", ex.getMessage());
104      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
105      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
106    }
107
108    ValidatedPosterPaths validated;
109    try {
110      validated = validateProtocols(config, allowOverwrite, !dryRun);
111    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
112      log.error("Invalid file path configuration: {}", ex.getMessage());
113      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
114      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
115    }
116
117    if (dryRun) {
118      printDryRunPlan(config, validated, allowOverwrite);
119      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
120    }
121
122    PosterUseCase useCase = new PosterUseCase();
123    try {
124      log.info("Starting poster pipelines with decode mode {}", config.decodeMode());
125      useCase.run(config);
126      log.info("Poster pipelines completed successfully");
127      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
128    } catch (IOException ex) {
129      log.error("Poster pipeline I/O failure", ex);
130      return ExitCode.IO_ERROR;
131    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
132      log.error("Poster pipeline configuration error: {}", ex.getMessage(), ex);
133      return ExitCode.CONFIG_ERROR;
134    } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
135      Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
136      log.error("Poster pipeline interrupted; shutting down", ex);
137      return ExitCode.INTERRUPTED;
138    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
139      log.error("Unexpected runtime failure in poster pipeline", ex);
140      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
141    } catch (Exception ex) {
142      log.error("Unexpected checked exception in poster pipeline", ex);
143      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
144    }
145  }
146
147  private static ValidatedPosterPaths validateProtocols(
148      PosterConfig config, boolean allowOverwrite, boolean createIfMissing) {
149    ProtocolValidation http = config.http().map(cfg ->
150        validateProtocol("HTTP", cfg, config.posterOutMode(), allowOverwrite, createIfMissing))
151        .orElse(null);
152    ProtocolValidation tn = config.tn3270().map(cfg ->
153        validateProtocol("TN3270", cfg, config.posterOutMode(), allowOverwrite, createIfMissing))
154        .orElse(null);
155    return new ValidatedPosterPaths(http, tn);
156  }
157
158  private static ProtocolValidation validateProtocol(
159      String name,
160      ProtocolConfig cfg,
161      IoMode posterOutMode,
162      boolean allowOverwrite,
163      boolean createIfMissing) {
164    Path inputDir = cfg.inputDirectory()
165        .map(PosterCli::ensureReadableDirectory)
166        .orElse(null);
167    Path outputDir = cfg.outputDirectory()
168        .map(path -> Paths.validateWritableDir(path, null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite))
169        .orElse(null);
170    if (posterOutMode == IoMode.FILE) {
171      if (outputDir == null) {
172        throw new IllegalArgumentException(name + " output directory required for FILE posterOutMode");
173      }
174    }
175    return new ProtocolValidation(name, inputDir, outputDir, cfg.kafkaInputTopic(), cfg.kafkaOutputTopic());
176  }
177
178  private static Path ensureReadableDirectory(Path path) {
179    try {
180      Path real = path.toRealPath();
181      if (!Files.isDirectory(real)) {
182        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input directory must exist: " + path);
183      }
184      if (!Files.isReadable(real)) {
185        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input directory is not readable: " + path);
186      }
187      return real;
188    } catch (IOException ex) {
189      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unable to access input directory: " + path, ex);
190    }
191  }
192
193  private static void printDryRunPlan(
194      PosterConfig config, ValidatedPosterPaths paths, boolean allowOverwrite) {
195    CliPrinter.printLines(
196        "Poster dry-run: no reports will be produced.",
197        " Input mode       : " + config.ioMode(),
198        " Poster out mode  : " + config.posterOutMode(),
199        " Kafka bootstrap  : " + config.kafkaBootstrap().orElse("<none>"),
200        " Decode mode      : " + config.decodeMode(),
201        describeProtocol(paths.http(), config.posterOutMode()),
202        describeProtocol(paths.tn3270(), config.posterOutMode()),
203        " Allow overwrite  : " + allowOverwrite,
204        " Re-run without --dry-run to render posters.");
205  }
206
207  private static String describeProtocol(ProtocolValidation validation, IoMode posterOutMode) {
208    if (validation == null) {
209      return " Protocol disabled";
210    }
211    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
212    sb.append(" ").append(validation.name()).append(" input    : ");
213    sb.append(validation.fileInput() == null ? "<Kafka>" : validation.fileInput().toString());
214    sb.append(" | output: ");
215    if (posterOutMode == IoMode.FILE) {
216      sb.append(
217          validation.fileOutput() == null ? "<required output missing>" : validation.fileOutput().toString());
218    } else {
219      sb.append(validation.kafkaOutput().orElse("<Kafka>"));
220    }
221    return sb.toString();
222  }
223
224  private record ProtocolValidation(
225      String name,
226      Path fileInput,
227      Path fileOutput,
228      Optional<String> kafkaInput,
229      Optional<String> kafkaOutput) {}
230
231  private record ValidatedPosterPaths(ProtocolValidation http, ProtocolValidation tn3270) {}
232}
233
234
235
